Project_Title: Exosomal miRNA sequencing of UVB-irradiated melanocytes and non-irradiated melanocytes (human)
Project_Description:
We report the exosomal miRNA expression profile of melanocytes with or without UVB treatment by miRNA sequencing.
Overall design: Examination of 2 different miRNome profiling in melanocytes.
